name: Artak

skills.name: Chaosrazor
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 35% chance to extend the duration of any [HP Burn] debuffs on each target by 1 turn.

effects.notes: AoE. 35% chance to extend HP Burn debuffs.

skills.notes: Synergizes with A3 for long HP Burn uptime.

skills.name: Dogs Of War
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Before attacking, instantly activates any [HP Burn] debuffs on each enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns.

effects.notes: AoE. Instantly activates HP Burn debuffs. 75% chance to place Decrease ATK.

skills.notes: HP Burn activation is key for Spider, Hydra, and boss content.

skills.name: Purifyre
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times. The first hit has a 75% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. Restores this Champion’s destroyed MAX HP by 10% for each [HP Burn] debuff placed by this skill. Heals this Champion by 5% of their MAX HP for each [HP Burn] debuff attempt blocked or resisted by the enemy team.

effects.notes: Double hit. First hit can place HP Burn. Restores destroyed MAX HP and heals on resist.

skills.notes: Restores destroyed MAX HP and heals on resist.

skills.name: Burning Blood
skills.description: Whenever a [HP Burn] debuff is activated, destroys this champion's MAX HP by 5% (stacks up to 50%). Increases this Champion’s DMG, C.DMG, and DEF by 1% for each 1% of their destroyed MAX HP. Also increases this Champion’s SPD and RES by 2 for each 1% of their destroyed MAX HP.

effects.notes: Destroys 5% of own MAX HP whenever HP Burn is activated (stacks up to 50%).
Increases DMG, C.DMG, DEF by 1% per 1% destroyed MAX HP; SPD and RES by 2 per 1% destroyed MAX HP.

skills.notes: Unique mechanic: stat scaling at the cost of destroyed MAX HP.

forms.comments: Artak is a top-tier HP Burn specialist for Spider, Hydra, and solo dungeon content. His passive enables unique stat scaling but requires careful management of destroyed MAX HP.

stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: HP%, SPD, ACC, C.RATE, C.DMG, DEF%
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: HP%, SPD, ACC, C.RATE, C.DMG, RES

clan_boss: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (A3 2-hit AoE synergy - 30% proc per hit = ~51% total proc chance per A3 use)

Support: Steadfast (+810 HP for destroyed MAX HP pool), Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter (A3 multi-hit), Evil Eye (TM control), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (CRITICAL - extends HP Burn from 2→3 turns, massive synergy with A1/A2/A3 HP Burn kit), Cycle of Magic (cooldown cycling for A2/A3 spam), Eagle Eye (+50 ACC for HP Burn consistency)
Defense: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst (healing synergy with self-damage passive), Delay Death (survivability)
dungeons: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (A3 2-hit AoE multi-proc - excellent for Spider, Fire Knight, Hydra)

Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter (A3 multi-hit), Evil Eye (TM control), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (CRITICAL - HP Burn extension for sustained damage), Cycle of Magic (A2/A3 spam), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC for HP Burn consistency - 200+ ACC needed)
Defense: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst (healing from passive self-damage), Delay Death (survivability for solo/cheese strategies)
arena: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Cycle of Violence (Arena farm), Kill Streak (Arena farm), Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (A3 2-hit AoE)

Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter (A3 multi-hit), Evil Eye (TM control), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (HP Burn extension), Cycle of Magic, Eagle Eye (+50 ACC for HP Burn/Dec ATK consistency)
Defense: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death, Unshakeable (+50 RES for tank builds - passive gives +100 RES at 50% destroyed MAX HP)
doom_tower: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (A3 2-hit AoE multi-proc for boss damage)

Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter (A3 multi-hit), Evil Eye (TM control vs waves), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (CRITICAL - HP Burn extension), Cycle of Magic (cooldown cycling), Lasting Gifts (buff extension if using buffers), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC - 250+ ACC for Hard)
Defense: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst (healing from passive), Delay Death, Unshakeable (debuff RES - passive gives +100 RES at 50% destroyed MAX HP)
faction_wars: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (A3 2-hit AoE multi-proc)

Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter (A3 multi-hit), Evil Eye (TM control), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (HP Burn extension), Cycle of Magic (A2/A3 spam), Eagle Eye (+50 ACC for HP Burn consistency)
Defense: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst (healing from passive), Delay Death (survivability)
general: PRIORITY OFFENSE T6: GIANT SLAYER (A3 'Purifyre' attacks all enemies 2 times - 30% proc per hit = ~51% total proc chance per A3 use for significant MAX HP damage). Warmaster is INCORRECT for Artak due to multi-hit A3.

PRIORITY SUPPORT T6: Master Hexer (CRITICAL for HP Burn extension - A1 has 35% base chance to extend, Master Hexer adds 30% chance to extend on placement → HP Burn lasts 2→3+ turns for sustained damage on Spider/Hydra/bosses). Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC for HP Burn consistency - need 200+ ACC dungeons, 250+ Doom Tower Hard).

KEY MASTERIES: Giant Slayer (A3 2-hit AoE), Master Hexer (HP Burn extension synergy with entire kit), Eagle Eye (ACC for HP Burn/Dec ATK consistency), Cycle of Magic (cooldown cycling for A2/A3 HP Burn spam), Bloodthirst (healing from passive self-damage mechanic).

SYNERGIES: A3 2-hit AoE benefits from Giant Slayer (30% proc per hit). A1/A2/A3 HP Burn kit benefits massively from Master Hexer (extends duration). Passive destroys MAX HP when HP Burn activates (5% per activation, 50% max) but grants scaling stats (+1% DMG/C.DMG/DEF per 1% destroyed, +2 SPD/RES per 1%). A3 restores destroyed MAX HP by 10% per HP Burn placed (self-sustain). Build for HP% (large MAX HP pool for passive scaling), SPD (200+), ACC (200+ dungeons, 250+ Hard Doom Tower with Eagle Eye).

CHEESE STRATEGY: HP Burn activation (A2 instantly activates HP Burn before attacking) + self-healing (A3 restores destroyed MAX HP + heals on resist) allows for solo Spider, Hydra, and dungeon strategies. Bloodthirst mastery enhances self-sustain.

UNIQUE MECHANIC: Passive stat scaling from destroyed MAX HP is unique - at 50% destroyed MAX HP, gains +50% DMG/C.DMG/DEF and +100 SPD/RES. Requires careful management of HP pool and use of A3 healing to sustain.

ORCS FACTION WARS: Top-tier carry (10/10 rating) - HP Burn damage bypasses enemy tankiness, self-sustain allows solo/low-support clears. User has completed Orc Normal, strong candidate for Hard progression.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Generally good AI. Will use HP Burn and activation skills appropriately. No major issues.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: HP Burn activation and self-healing allow for soloing Spider, Hydra, and dungeons.

mechanics_advisory: Artak is a top-tier HP Burn specialist (Clan Boss 9/10, Dungeons 10/10, Doom Tower 9/10, Faction Wars 10/10) with unique stat-scaling passive. A3 'Purifyre' is 2-hit AoE that benefits from Giant Slayer (30% proc per hit). KEY STRENGTHS: (1) Complete HP Burn kit - A3 places HP Burn (75% chance, 2 turns), A1 extends HP Burn (35% chance +1 turn), A2 INSTANTLY ACTIVATES HP Burn before attacking (massive burst damage on Spider/Hydra/bosses), (2) Self-sustain - A3 restores destroyed MAX HP by 10% per HP Burn placed + heals 5% MAX HP on resist, (3) Unique passive - destroys 5% MAX HP per HP Burn activation (50% max) but grants scaling stats (+1% DMG/C.DMG/DEF per 1% destroyed, +2 SPD/RES per 1%), (4) Dec ATK debuff (75% chance, 2 turns) for team survivability. REQUIRES Master Hexer mastery (CRITICAL - extends HP Burn 2→3+ turns for sustained damage) and Eagle Eye (+50 ACC for 200+ total). At 50% destroyed MAX HP, gains +50% DMG/C.DMG/DEF and +100 SPD/RES. Build for HP% (large MAX HP pool), 200+ SPD, 200+ ACC (250+ Hard Doom Tower), C.RATE/C.DMG for damage. CHEESE STRATEGY: HP Burn activation (A2) + self-healing (A3) allows solo Spider, Hydra, and dungeon clears. Bloodthirst mastery enhances sustain. User's Orcs Faction Wars COMPLETE (Normal) - excellent for Hard progression. Top-tier for Spider 25, Hydra, and HP Burn cheese teams.

update_notes.last_patch: MAJOR UPDATE: Corrected T6 Offense mastery from Warmaster to GIANT SLAYER (A3 'Purifyre' attacks all enemies 2 times - 30% proc per hit = ~51% total proc chance). Added complete masteries section with full offense/defense/support trees per content type. KEY ADDITIONS: Giant Slayer (A3 2-hit AoE synergy), Master Hexer (CRITICAL - extends HP Burn duration from A1/A2/A3 kit), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC for HP Burn/Dec ATK consistency - 200+ ACC needed), Cycle of Magic (A2/A3 cooldown spam), Bloodthirst (healing synergy with passive self-damage mechanic). CLARIFIED: Passive destroys MAX HP when HP Burn activates (5% per activation, 50% max) but grants scaling stats (+1% DMG/C.DMG/DEF per 1% destroyed, +2 SPD/RES per 1%). A3 restores destroyed MAX HP (10% per HP Burn placed) + heals on resist (5% per resist) for self-sustain. A2 INSTANTLY ACTIVATES HP Burn before attacking (cheese synergy for Spider/Hydra/boss burst). Expanded mechanics_advisory with Giant Slayer synergy, Master Hexer critical importance, cheese strategy details, and Orc Faction Wars notes (user completed Normal). Added validation_sources.
